@@ -1,1373 +0,0 @@
-class Peesoa:%0A    def __init__(self, name : str, money :int):%0A        self._name : str = name%0A        self._money: int = money%0A    def getName(self) -%3E str:%0A        return self._name%0A    def getMoney(self)-%3E int:%0A        return self._money%0A    def setMoney(self, valor : int)-%3E int:%0A        self._money = valor%0A    def pagar(self, valor: int) -%3E int:%0A        self.__money -= valor%0A    def receber(self, valor: int) -%3E:%0A        self._money += valor%0A    def __str__(self)-%3E str:%0A        return f%22%7Bself.getName()%7D:%7Bself.getMoney()%7D%22%0A    %0A%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A        moto=Moto(0)%0A        while True:%0A            line = input()%0A            print(%22$ + line%22)%0A            args = line.split()%0A            if args %5B0%5D ==%22end%22 :%0A                break%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A                print(moto)%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22setDriver%22:%0A                name = args%5B1%5D%0A                money = int(args%5B2%5D)%0A                motorista = Pessoa(name, money)%0A                moto.setDriver(motorista)%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22setPass%22:%0A                name = args%5B1%5D%0A                money = int(args%5B2%5D)%0A                passageiro = Pessoa(name, money)%0A                moto.setPass(passageiro)%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22drive%22:%0A                km = int(args%5B1%5D)%0A                moto.dirigir(km)%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22leavePass%22:%0A                moto.descer()%0Amain()
